description: Safety hooks to block or require approval for dangerous commands

hooks.command: bash -c 'if test -f "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/hooks/bash_hook.py"; then python3 "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/hooks/bash_hook.py"; else echo "{\"decision\":\"approve\"}"; fi'
